amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that the national missile defense (NMD) system will be compliant with the 1972 ABM Treaty; provide that, if any provision authorizes a non-compliant NMD system or breach of the treaty, such provision is based on the assumption that the ABM Treaty would be amended to make the provision treaty compliant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that the provisions of the bill establishing a National Missile Defense system will comply with the provisions of the 1972 ABM Treaty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spratt amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 242 (Roll no. 373).
